alert.note: Alert for Dubuque (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 15 at 3:19PM CDT until April 17 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON SUNDAY TO 7 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Iowa, Dubuque County. In Illinois, Jo Daviess and Stephenson Counties. * WHEN...From noon Sunday to 7 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow may result in damage to trees that have leafed out.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
